meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Heather Burnett Ben Rothenberg Buzzy Cohen Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7289.

td.p: Heather Burnett, an accountant from Orlando, Florida
Ben Rothenberg, a sportswriter from Washington, D.C.
Buzzy Cohen, a music executive from Los Angeles, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $58,401)

tr.td: BROADWAY
NASA SAYS
STATELY MUSEUMS
LAST LINK IN THE DRINK
FAMILIAR PHRASES
PEOPLES
